Búsqueda rápida

logger¶

Nota

Library to manage the log system.

class helpers.logger.__init__.LoggerManager(logname, logevent, schema=None, session=None)¶
Parámetros

  • logname (str.) – Logs handler name.

  • logevent (str.) – Logs file name.

  • schema (dict.) – Data schema to validate with. Default value is None.

  • session (Dict.) – Dictionary with the data session. Default value is None.

Muestra

IOError – Error handeling the file.

write_info(data)¶

Function to write a log info.

Parámetros

data (dict.) – Dictionary with the info to write on log.

write_error(data)¶

Function to write a log error.

Parámetros

data (dict.) – Dictionary with the error to write on log.

write_exception(exc)¶

Function to write a log excepción.

Parámetros

exc (Exception Object.) – Exception to write on log.

custom_logger¶

class helpers.logger.custom_logger.CustomLogger(name_handler, file_name)¶

This class overwrite the Class Logging to create a custom log.

Parámetros

  • name_handler (string) – Logs handler name.

  • file_name (string) – Logs file name.

set_logger()¶

Function to set all the params for the Class Logging.

Devuelve

Custom Logger object.

Tipo del valor devuelto

Logger object.

logger_manager¶

class helpers.logger.logger_manager.LoggerManager(logname, logevent, schema=None, session=None)¶
Parámetros

  • logname (str.) – Logs handler name.

  • logevent (str.) – Logs file name.

  • schema (dict.) – Data schema to validate with. Default value is None.

  • session (Dict.) – Dictionary with the data session. Default value is None.

Muestra

IOError – Error handeling the file.

Function to write a log info.

Parámetros

data (dict.) – Dictionary with the info to write on log.

write_error(data)¶

Function to write a log error.

Parámetros

data (dict.) – Dictionary with the error to write on log.
